attributes.action: THE SOVEREIGN PEOPLE OF THIS COUNTRY DEMAND A GENERAL ELECTION NOW,
attributes.additional_details: DELIBERATELY IGNORING PUBLIC VOTING SYSTEM,  TRYING TO MAKE DEALS WITH THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT , IN A SELF SERVING ATTITUDE, AND MAKING UP LAWS TO REFLECT AWAY FROM DEMOCRACY.
attributes.background: 17.4 MILLION PEOPLE VOTED TO LEAVE THE EU, THEY UNDERSTOOD IT WAS LEAVE COMPLETELY, THE GOVERNMENT AND PARTIES, HAVE CONTINUED TO IGNORE  THIS DEMOCRATIC VOTE ,FROM THE BIGGEST MAJORITY IN THE HISTORY OF THIS COUNTRY, THE PEOPLE WANT A GENERAL ELECTION BEFORE THE 31ST OF OCTOBER 2019
